2.6.9  Improved and Faster Media

Two new sampling methods are added.

One, called method 2, distributes samples evenly along the viewing ray or light ray. The other, method 3, uses adaptive sampling (similar to adaptive anti-aliasing) which is very much like the sampling method used in POV-Ray 3.0's atmosphere. As a result, media renders faster and smoother.
